mapper.select: SELECT a.anime_id AS animeId, a.title_english AS title, a.cover_image_url AS coverImageUrl FROM Anime a WHERE a.anime_id = #{referenceAnimeId}
SELECT at.anime_id AS animeId, t.name_eng AS tagName, at.weight AS weight FROM Animetag at JOIN Tag t ON at.tag_id = t.tag_id WHERE at.anime_id = #{animeId} ORDER BY at.weight DESC
